name: Lucky Blast
description:
Lucky Blast - blast more, beat the higher score,win more coin rewards!
The HOTTEST puzzle game of 2020!

Welcome to the high-tech cannon kingdom hidden in your phone and waiting to be revealed through merges at every turn!

Lucky Blast is a super fun & challenging, free cartoon match puzzle game. In 2020, come on with Lucky Blast Smash and get ready to blast and crush the blocks, at the meanwhile, pass more levels and complete the adventure story with collecting landmark constructions! In Lucky Blast, you can not only enjoy the blasting feelings of puzzle games, but also you can get easy guidance to construct your fantastic constructions! Here, as the construction grows, more features will be unlocked and challenge more tasks to construct more super landmarks!

Have you ever felt difficult when playing a match-3 puzzle game? In Lucky Blast, you can only enjoy the strong explosive feeling of the “crush crush” or “blasting” effect. This is a kind of blasting puzzle game for all adults and children. Match 3 or 2 cubes of the same color and crush or blast the blocks and collect toy and toon to clear a level.

More Fun features:
Dozens of level to unlock!
Awesome prizes from earnings multipliers!
